medical_history.chief_complaint: Increased abdominal pain, nausea, and dry heaving.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient reported that symptoms began as a new development and did not occur earlier in the day. She has a history of abdominal pain related to her tumor, but this episode has been the worst it has ever been. She has also experienced rigors and has been becoming more fatigued over the past week, with a significant decline in the last 2 days. The pain was localized to the right upper quadrant and improved when she remained still.
medical_history.past_medical_history: DMII, HTN, Bipolar depression, known hepatocellular carcinoma, metastatic disease on sorafenib.
medical_history.family_history: Brother with history of gastric cancer; no family history of colon or liver cancers. No history of Crohn's or ulcerative colitis.
